body_html:
I’ll try reproducing the error with the mnist example.

We’ve also been seeing weird things with TF 1.10 (compared to 1.9) and cuda streams but that’ll be another issue created after a bit more investigation - the CUDA error might be more related to that.

I’ll try reproducing the error with the mnist example.

We’ve also been seeing weird things with TF 1.10 (compared to 1.9) and cuda streams but that’ll be another issue created after a bit more investigation - the CUDA error might be more related to that.
